tasks.title: Implement Korean Translation for Landing Page
tasks.description: Create and implement translated content for the landing page in Korean, ensuring accuracy and cultural relevance.
tasks.details:
1. Review the existing English landing page content.
2. Translate all text elements into Korean, paying close attention to nuances and cultural context.
3. Adapt images and other visual elements as needed to resonate with the Korean audience.
4. Implement the translated content within the landing page's HTML structure, replacing the English text.
5. Ensure proper encoding and font support for Korean characters.
6. Optimize the translated landing page for Korean search engines (SEO).
7. Conduct a thorough review of the translated content with a native Korean speaker to ensure accuracy and fluency.
8. Update the landing page metadata with Korean keywords and descriptions.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify that all English text on the landing page has been accurately translated into Korean.
2. Confirm that the translated content is grammatically correct and reads naturally in Korean.
3. Check that all images and visual elements are appropriate for the Korean audience.
4. Ensure that the landing page displays correctly in Korean web browsers and on various devices.
5. Validate that the landing page is optimized for Korean search engines by checking metadata and keyword usage.
6. Conduct user testing with native Korean speakers to gather feedback on the translated content and overall user experience.
7. Verify that all links and calls to action function correctly in the translated version.

subtasks.title: Translate HeroSection Content to Korean & Update JSON
subtasks.description: Translate the HeroSection content of the landing page into Korean, focusing on cultural relevance and SEO. Update the corresponding JSON file with the Korean translations.
subtasks.details: Translate all text elements within the HeroSection, including headings, subheadings, and call-to-action buttons. Ensure the translation accurately conveys the original meaning while resonating with a Korean audience. Update the JSON file with the new Korean translation keys and values.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the Korean translation in the HeroSection matches the JSON file and displays correctly on the landing page. Confirm cultural appropriateness with a native Korean speaker.
